doc.field: The collection contains appraisals for properties located on Duffield Street and Willoughby Street in Downtown Brooklyn by Edmund B. Brooks, William A. Stewart, and Jacques O. Tuchler. Included with the appraisals are photographs and maps of the properties. The appraisals were conducted in relation to the urban renewal and redevelopment efforts underway in Downtown Brooklyn during this period.

The collection contains appraisals for properties located on Duffield Street and Willoughby Street in Downtown Brooklyn by Edmund B. Brooks, William A. Stewart, and Jacques O. Tuchler. Included with the appraisals are photographs and maps of the properties. The appraisals were conducted in relation to the urban renewal and redevelopment efforts underway in Downtown Brooklyn during this period.

The collection contains appraisals for properties located at 211-221 Duffield Street and 110-114 Willoughby Street by Edmund B. Brooks, 201-221 Duffield Street and 106-114 Willoughby Street by William A. Stewart, and 201-221 Duffield Street and 106-114 Willoughby Street by Jacques O. Tuchler. Included with the appraisals are photographs, floorplans, and maps of the properties. The appraisals were conducted in relation to the urban renewal and redevelopment efforts underway in Downtown Brooklyn during this period.
Source and date of acquisition unknown. The collection was formally accessioned in 1980.
